title: Winner Announcement: STO (Slovenian Tourism Organisation) Challenge

presenter: Eva Štravs Podlogar, Turizem Bled, Zavod za pospeševanje turizma

segmentation: As previously mentioned by Andrea, we had the one challenge which was focused on using the old Slovenian stories and making up new adventures for tourists in Slovenia.
Global Youth was encouraged to make new tourist products, roots, museums, makeup, whatever inventive there is, and we received a lot of solutions, three of them reaching the winning stage.
Helena from Poland did a very nice solutions on the destination to you.
Unfortunately she is not here with us today because she had to leave in the morning, but I think she deserves one grade A plus.
Another very interesting solution related to the destination Maribor came from.
Believe it or not Iran neelofar.
And the third one as you expected, came from a Slovenian girl, Mayo Green, who also had to leave the summit earlier, and she is not among us.
But the most important now is to announce an invite.
The representative from the Slovenian Tourist Board who made this competition available to us to global youth.
I would invite Eva Strauss, Podlogar to give the winning award the winners.
But before I will pass the word, please allow me to say a few words.
How honored and pleased we were at Slevin Tourist Board to be a partner of Challenge student for the second challenge.
So thank you Andrea to give us this chance and I must say our idea was how to mate.
Yes, old stories and legends for new adventures and it was really amazing to find 56 different stories and.
Young people from all over the globe writing the tourist product about the destinations they never even dreamed about in a country they never visited yet.
And so this was, I suppose, really, really looking outside the box otherwise it won't be that the main award is going to Iran and telling us what we can do more for promoting our wine product.

summarization_data.sent: As previously mentioned by Andrea, we had the one challenge which was focused on using the old Slovenian stories and making up new adventures for tourists in Slovenia.
Global Youth was encouraged to make new tourist products, roots, museums, makeup, whatever inventive there is, and we received a lot of solutions, three of them reaching the winning stage.
Helena from Poland did a very nice solutions on the destination to you.
Unfortunately she is not here with us today because she had to leave in the morning, but I think she deserves one grade A plus.
Another very interesting solution related to the destination Maribor came from.
Believe it or not Iran neelofar.
And the third one as you expected, came from a Slovenian girl, Mayo Green, who also had to leave the summit earlier, and she is not among us.
But the most important now is to announce an invite.
The representative from the Slovenian Tourist Board who made this competition available to us to global youth.
I would invite Eva Strauss, Podlogar to give the winning award the winners.
But before I will pass the word, please allow me to say a few words.
How honored and pleased we were at Slevin Tourist Board to be a partner of Challenge student for the second challenge.
So thank you Andrea to give us this chance and I must say our idea was how to mate.
Yes, old stories and legends for new adventures and it was really amazing to find 56 different stories and.
Young people from all over the globe writing the tourist product about the destinations they never even dreamed about in a country they never visited yet.
And so this was, I suppose, really, really looking outside the box otherwise it won't be that the main award is going to Iran and telling us what we can do more for promoting our wine product.
